schema.title: Digital Outcomes and Specialists Digital outcomes Brief Schema

data.backgroundInformation: We are looking for a supplier to help us improve our digital services.
culturalFitCriteria: Ability to work collaboratively with our team
Experience of working in an agile environment
data.endUsers: Our users are members of the public who need to access our services online.
essentialRequirements: Experience of designing and delivering digital services
Ability to work with our existing technology stack
data.existingTeam: We have a team of developers, designers, and project managers who will be working on this project.
niceToHaveRequirements: Experience of working with our specific technology stack
data.outcome: We want to improve the user experience of our digital services.
successCriteria: Increased usage of our digital services
Successful delivery of the project on time and within budget
data.summary: We are looking for a supplier to help us improve our digital services.
data.title: Digital Services Improvement Project
data.workingArrangements: We expect the supplier to work collaboratively with our team and to be based on site for at least 2 days per week.

data.backgroundInformation: This project aims to improve the user experience of our website.
data.earlyMarketEngagement: We have conducted market research and gathered feedback from potential users.
essentialRequirements: Develop a new website with a modern design
Ensure the website is accessible on mobile devices
data.existingTeam: We have a team of developers and designers who will work on this project.
data.outcome: A new website that provides a better user experience for citizens and businesses.
data.questionAndAnswerSessionDetails: A Q&A session will be held on 10th January 2024.
successCriteria: The website is launched within 6 months
The website has a user satisfaction rating of 80%
The website is accessible on mobile devices
data.summary: We are seeking a supplier to develop a new website with a modern design and improved search functionality.
data.title: Development of a new website
data.workAlreadyDone: We have conducted market research and gathered feedback from potential users.
data.workingArrangements: The supplier will work closely with our team to develop the website.
